description: Ember is a shared vacation home company.

Ember's tech-forward approach transforms traditional ownership by enabling co-owners to purchase luxurious properties, unlocking an opportunity that most people previously thought was out of reach. Ember streamlines every step of the vacation home ownership process from purchase to planning each stay with the proprietary Ember app and enhances the experience with a personal, in-market Ember Concierge who manages everything from services to maintenance of the home.
market: medium high - I like the idea of bringing shared ownership to more people and they way they take care of what might be typical pain points (repairs, maintenance, management). description: Born for e-commerce. We provide order fulfillment, distribution, warehousing, packaging, and kitting/assembly services.
Full Description: A DIFFERENT FULFILLMENT EXPERIENCE Having grown and worked with countless e-commerce-focused companies, we saw a need for a different fulfillment experience. Warehousing and logistics shouldnâ€™t be a commodity, but a service that can surprise & delight customers. With the rise of e-commerce over the past few years, many cracks were exposed in how traditional 3PLs were managing and fulfilling orders. Like Grandpa trying to use tik-tok to stay current, these industry titans were unable to keep pace with the growing demands of businesses shifting their focus to online marketplaces. As a result, many of these companies were hindered in their ability to scale. After doing a deep dive into what todayâ€™s online businesses were faced with, our team went to work on building a different fulfillment experience â€“ One that would put an emphasis on surprising and delighting the brands we serve. Pitted Logistics was born out of love and a lot of listening. Pitted Logistics is committed to serving our clients to the highest level of service possible. We are technology-driven, service-oriented, people-focused, and stay on the bleeding edge of industry trends. Unlike traditional 3PLs, we are actively engaged in all aspects of the e-commerce world through our sister companies and proprietary technology, Pitted Labs, Pitted Ventures, and Atlas.
